Slider

Usage

Open this example in a new window 

    <div class="c-slider" data-module="slider">
      <div class="c-slider__slides">
        <div class="c-slider__slide is-active">
          <picture class="c-slider__picture">
            <source srcset="..." media="(min-width: 768px)">
            <img class="c-slider__image" src="..." alt="">
          </picture>
          <div class="c-slider__content">
            <div class="c-slider__text">
              <h1>...</h1>
              <p>...</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        ...
      </div>
      <div class="c-slider__controls">
        <div class="c-slider__previous">
          ...
        </div>
        <div class="c-slider__pips"></div>
        <div class="c-slider__next">
          ...
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
